name: Bite City
description:
My entry to the A Game By Its Cover 2021 gamejam!

Tear down the city and reclaim nature! A little game about chomping down on different things found in the city!

I took inspiration from this image created by the talented Jasper Oprel (https://twitter.com/oprel)

Credits:

Music:
Oh My/Patrick Patrikios
New Day/Patrick Patrikios

(YouTube Audio Library)

The Bite Font: Vikrant Kishore/DaFont https://www.dafont.com/thebite.font?text=BITE+CITY

SFX:

Bite sound: Inspector J/freesound https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/412068/

Select sound: Tissman/freesound https://freesound.org/people/Tissman/sounds/531852/

All pictures taken by me!
